title: Controversy not about the tweets, Salaita says (University of Illinois at Chicago)
text: ( Source : University of Illinois at Chicago ) 'We are being told that our job now as thinkers, as teachers, is not to challenge orthodoxy,' says Steven Salaita at a campus lecture Oct. 12. Photo : Monique Phillips ' It's about tweets? Really ,
